10-11-2024: - Torment {AbilityIcon|Ability=Pulse|Size=20} Pulse now scales with cooldown again
- Torment {AbilityIcon|Ability=Pulse|Size=20} Pulse Spirit power scaling reduced from 0.33 to 0.3
10-10-2024: - {AbilityIcon|Ability=Pulse|Size=20} Pulse interval is now fixed and does not get reduced with cooldown reduction
09-26-2024: - Spirit Power damage scaling increased from 0.25 to 0.33
08-29-2024: - Spirit damage scaling increased from 0.2 to 0.24
08-15-2024: - Weakened Patron now has a Torment {AbilityIcon|Ability=Pulse|Size=20} Pulse style effect, hitting up to 2 enemies in the pit for 75 damage per second
06-06-2024: - Damage per pulse reduced from 45 to 40 (total dps from 22.5 to 26.6)
